Package domain

Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
domain.Teacher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Teacher extends Object implements Serializable
This is the user class, it will store information pertaining to the user the instance belongs to including name and password, and the classes they teach.
Author:
william

    • addClass

      public ClassRoster addClass(String className, String id)
      This adds a class to the users list of classes.
      Parameters:
      className - The name of the class being added.
      id - The ID for this new class.
      Returns:
      Returns a pointer to the new class for the control class to assign as the current class.

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String password)
      Compares the password provided against the one for this teacher. Used instead of a getter function for security purposes.
      Parameters:
      password - The password the system wants to check.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the password matches, and false otherwise.

    • getName

      the getter function for the username.
      Returns:
      Returns the username.
